Oct 16, 2016 - "Marcello Dudovich (21 March 1878 in Trieste â€“ 31 March 1962 in Milan) was an Italian painter, illustrator, and poster designer. Together with Leonetto Cappiello, Adolfo Hohenstein, Giovanni Maria Mataloni and Leopoldo Metlicovitz he is considered one of the progenitors of Italian poster design." WikiPedia
. See more ideas about italian posters, leonetto cappiello, vintage posters.
